meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of an acrostic.
meanings.sent1: The acrostical poem had the first letter of each line spelling out a secret message.
meanings.sent2: She created an acrostical puzzle for her friends to solve.
meanings.sent3: The acrostical riddle made everyone scratch their heads in confusion.
meanings.sent4: His acrostical writing style was as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The acrostical nature of the artwork added an element of surprise.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or composed of acrostics.
meanings.sent1: The acrostical book contained hidden messages within its pages.
meanings.sent2: The acrostical structure of the song made it memorable.
meanings.sent3: The acrostical design on the cake was a delightful surprise for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: Her acrostical approach to storytelling captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The acrostical pattern on the fabric was intricate and beautiful.
